title: Caveman2CosmosV24
description:
Mod for civ4 Beyond the Sword Alot better than Civ5!!! To install make sure that you have patch 3.19 for Beyond the Sword.

Open civ4Beyond the Swordmods make new folder name c2c or a name you remember. open caveman2cosmos24 copy all files to the new folder. Then open the rest and put it in the civ4Beyond the Swordmodsc2vassets

Run civ4 Beyond the Sword and chose advanced, load mod and load c2c

If you pick custom game, make shore you pick starting in prehistoric to get full game experience!
